solution_line_template: At 7 weeks old, the puppy weighed {weight_7wks} pounds, but doubled in weight by week 9 to reach a weight of {weight_7wks}*{double}=<<{weight_7wks}+{weight_7wks}={weight_9wks}>>{weight_9wks} pounds.
It doubled in weight again at 3 months old to reach a weight of {weight_9wks}*{double}=<<{weight_9wks}*{double}={weight_3mo}>>{weight_3mo} pounds.
It doubled in weight again at 5 months old to reach a weight of {weight_3mo}*{double}=<<{weight_3mo}*{double}={weight_5mo}>>{weight_5mo} pounds.
And it reached its full adult weight by adding another {added_final} lbs to reach a final weight of {weight_5mo}+{added_final}={final_weight} pounds.
